channel.title: How do I make it so I have unlimited run?
channel.description: How do I make it so I have unlimited run?

item.title: How do I make it so I have unlimited run?
item.dc:creator: @igottapet igottapet
item.description:
@igottapet wrote:

Whell, theres a god command that i have. it gives u unlmntd run and health and ur flying. you could just edit out everything execpt run if u want.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 3) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("::godoff to turn off."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 3){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make it so I have unlimited run?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

you can do this for all players have unlimated run

no don't do that i have right way hold on // send "running packet" str.writeBits(2, 2); // updateType str.writeBits(3, misc.xlateDirectionToClient[dir1]); str.writeBits(3, misc.xlateDirectionToClient[dir2]); if(updateRequired) str.writeBits(1, 1); // tell client there's an update block appended at the end else str.writeBits(1, 0); if (playerEnergy > 9999999) { playerEnergy -= 999999; } else { isRunning2 = false; stoprunning = true; } } }

}
look for energy in player.java and set the one to 999999999
then save and compile

or u can do wt that guy done in pic for just a certian guy to have unlimated run its up da u.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make it so I have unlimited run?
item.dc:creator: @killer90210 killer90210
item.description:
@killer90210 wrote:

no don’t do that
i have right way
hold on
// send “running packet”
str.writeBits(2, 2); // updateType
str.writeBits(3, misc.xlateDirectionToClient[dir1]);
str.writeBits(3, misc.xlateDirectionToClient[dir2]);
if(updateRequired) str.writeBits(1, 1); // tell client there’s an update block appended at the end
else str.writeBits(1, 0);
if (playerEnergy > 9999999) {
playerEnergy -= 999999;
} else {
isRunning2 = false;
stoprunning = true;
}
}
}

}
look for energy in player.java and set the one to 999999999
then save and compile

Read full topic
